response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs. Considering its unparalleled quality and significance, we are extending an offer to purchase it at a special price of $950,000. We believe this represents an outstanding value proposition, allowing you to secure this remarkable asset without compromising on its worth. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and contributing to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
